actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-547.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.J. Res. 430, a joint resolution making urgent supplemental appropriations for low-income energy assistance for the fiscal year ending Sept. 30, 1980, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 430 (Supplemental appropriations for low-income energy assistance).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.J. Res. 430, a joint resolution making urgent supplemental appropriations for low-income energy assistance for the fiscal year ending Sept. 30, 1980, and for other purposes.
